None.Name: Heal
None.Description: Every 11 seconds the gate heals a friendly unit for 600 life points.

None.Name: Tunnel Exit
None.Description: The gate grants access to the tunnel network. Activate to become an exit point of the tunnel network.

None.Name: Blessed Linked Fire
None.Description:
Up to 3 entities connected to the root network support each other enabling more powerful attacks. The gate will then be able to continuously heal ever faster. What is more, while being
connected the gate takes 30% less damage.
